bestseller.title: Dior Savage
bestseller.description:
The strong whiff of citrus fruits in Sauvage Eau de Toilette is firmly anchored in the amber nobility of Ambroxan, natural resin and woody accords that bind the whole.

Immediately recognizable, it has become an authentic, distinctive fragrance, unique* in its confident masculinity. Like a deep breath of fresh air, Sauvage Eau de Toilette is a bold composition for a man true to his values.

bestseller.title: Chanel Coco Mademoiselle
bestseller.description: Determined and sensual, rebellious and refined, absolutely independent - COCO MADEMOISELLE embodies the elegance of simplicity. The sensual aura of Eau de Parfum, the deep and tempting notes of Eau de Parfum Intense and the subtle chord of L'Eau Privée, for the night. The scent is enlivened with Hair Perfumes.

bestseller.title: Bleu De Chanel
bestseller.description: The heart of the perfume includes notes of cedar, patchouli, jasmine and pink pepper, while the base is dominated by notes of amber, patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood and white amber. This refined and sensual fragrance is perfect for any occasion, both day and night. Thanks to its durability and projection, it will provide a long-lasting and intense scent on the skin.

bestseller.title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540
bestseller.description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540 is an oriental-floral composition from 2015 for women, created by Francis Kurkdjian. A strong, exceptionally deep approach to oriental-floral ingredients presented by master perfumer - Francis Kurkdjian. Baccarat Rouge 540 is the first fragrance composition created in his own perfume house, inspired by the fiery red that permeates women's bodies.d.
